name: Kuss Machine Tool & Die Co. v. El-Tronics, Inc., Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the able opinion of President Judge Hagan of the Court of Common Pleas No. 1 of Philadélphia County.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Donald W. Hedges, with him Arthur Hr egg J achson, Thomas F. Wilson, and Mancill, Cooney, Semans and Hedges, for appellant.,
